column5: hey was just wondering if anyones had any luck on the detroit river so far (ontario side), ive seen 100's of ppl out there but no idea if theyre catching anything only seen 1 guy pull up a pickerel, thats about it, so yea any good news? im thinkin of goin in the casino area (fishin from shore) show some pics if ya got em, let me know what lures or bait u were usin  thanks -Jay
